'''''Gymnopilus magnificus''''' is a species of [[mushroom]] in the [[Cortinariaceae]] family. It was described as new to science in 1986 by Mexican mycologists [[Gastón Guzmán]] and Lara Guzmán-Dávalos.<ref name=Guzman1986/>
